TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Tasutasunan, title = Tasutasunan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tasutasunan} }

S.FORM: Tasutasunan Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Tasutasunan a niyaro', 3,465 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 7,402 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 53% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 3,908 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 47% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,494 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis37%, Bunun2%, Tayal2%, Paiwan1%, Truku6%, Sakizaya3%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Tasotasonan Itiniay i Hoalien Cen no Hoalien ko Tasotasonan a niyaro', 3,465 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 7,402 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 53% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 3,908 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 47% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,494 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis37%, Bonon2%, Tayal2%, Paiwan1%, Troko6%, Sakizaya3%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
